com.ibm.avatar.api

Interface ExternalTypeInfo


  • public interface ExternalTypeInfo
    An instance of this type acts as a container to hold information about external dictionaries and external tables. The Text Analytics loader uses this information to load the external artifacts into the operator graph. The information contained in an ExternalTypeInfo object could be either the URI of files containing data for external dictionaries and external tables (or) the actual content of external dictionaries and external tables.

    Use the class ExternalTypeInfoFactory to create an instance of this type.

    Supported file formats for these external artifacts are:
    • For external tables: Comma-separated values (CSV) with headers.
    • For external dictionaries: Carriage-return-delimited text files with one dictionary entry per line.

    See External Artifact File Formats for more details.

    See Also:
    OperatorGraph, ExternalTypeInfoFactory

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addDictionary

        void addDictionary(String dictionaryName,
                   List<String> dictionaryEntries)
        Populates the ExternalTypeInfo object with entries for the given external dictionary.
        Parameters:
        dictionaryName - name of the external dictionary, as declared in the create external dictionary statement, fully qualified with the module name
        dictionaryEntries - entries of the dictionary, as a list of String objects

      • addDictionary

        void addDictionary(String dictionaryName,
                   String dictionaryFileURI)
        Adds the specified external dictionary URI to the ExternalTypeInfo object. Use this API if external dictionary entries are available in a file.
        Parameters:
        dictionaryName - name of the external dictionary, as declared in the create external dictionary statement, fully qualified with the module name
        dictionaryFileURI - URI of the file containing the dictionary entries in supported format. file://, hdfs://, and gpfs:// URI formats are supported. See Supported URI Formats for details.

      • addTable

        void addTable(String tableName,
              ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> tableEntries)
        Populates the ExternalTypeInfo object with entries for the given external table. The order and type of fields in the tableEntries parameter should match with the schema of the external table as defined in the AQL. The loader throws an exception if there is a mismatch of schemas.
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the external table, as declared in the create external table statement, fully qualified with the module name
        tableEntries - entries of the table, represented as list of list of String objects. The outer list is a collection of table rows and the inner list is a collection of fields in a given row.

      • addTable

        void addTable(String tableName,
              String tableFileURI)
        Adds the specified external table URI to the ExternalTypeInfo object. Use this API if external table entries are available in a file. This API accepts only MS-Excel style CSV files with headers. If either the header or the entries in the CSV file does not adhere to the declared schema of the external table, the loader will throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the external table, as declared in the create external table statement , fully qualified by the containing module's name
        tableFileURI - URI to the file containing table entries in the supported format. file://, hdfs://, and gpfs:// URI formats are supported. See Supported URI Formats for details.

      • getDictionaryNames

        List<String> getDictionaryNames()
        Returns the names of all external dictionaries added to the ExternalTypeInfo object.
        Returns:
        names of all external dictionaries added to the ExternalTypeInfo object.

      • getTableNames

        List<String> getTableNames()
        Returns the names of all external tables added to the ExternalTypeInfo object.
        Returns:
        names of all external tables added to the ExternalTypeInfo object.
